name: High School Senior STEM Scholarship
description: Scholarship for high school seniors planning to major in STEM fields. Open to students with strong academic records and demonstrated interest in science, technology, engineering, or mathematics.
stem_fields: Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Science, Technology

name: Women in STEM High School Scholarship
description: Supporting female high school students pursuing careers in science, technology, engineering, and mathematics. Promotes gender diversity in STEM fields starting in high school.
stem_fields: Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Science, Technology

name: Minority STEM High School Leaders Scholarship
description: Scholarship for underrepresented minority high school students in STEM fields. Supports African American, Hispanic, Native American students pursuing STEM education.
stem_fields: Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Science, Technology

name: High School Mathematics Excellence Award
description: Recognizing excellence in mathematics for high school students. For students pursuing pure or applied mathematics studies.

name: High School Technology Innovation Scholarship
description: For high school students innovating in technology fields including software development, information systems, and data science.

name: High School Computer Science Scholarship
description: Scholarship for high school students pursuing computer science. Applicants must demonstrate passion for technology and programming.

name: High School Engineering Scholarship
description: Merit-based scholarship for high school students interested in engineering. Supports students in all engineering disciplines including mechanical, electrical, civil, and chemical engineering.

name: High School Science Research Scholarship
description: For high school students conducting original scientific research. Supports student scientists across all disciplines.

name: First Generation STEM High School Scholarship
description: Supporting first-generation high school students in STEM fields. Breaking barriers in STEM education for students whose parents did not attend college.
stem_fields: Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Science, Technology

name: Rural STEM High School Student Scholarship
description: For STEM students from rural communities. Promoting STEM education access in underserved and rural areas.
stem_fields: Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Science, Technology

name: High School Robotics and Automation Scholarship
description: Supporting high school students in robotics, automation, and mechatronics. For future robotics engineers and innovators.

name: High School Environmental Science Scholarship
description: For high school students dedicated to environmental conservation and sustainability through scientific study.

name: High School Physics and Astronomy Scholarship
description: For high school students pursuing physics or astronomy. Supports theoretical and experimental physics interests.

name: High School Biomedical Science Scholarship
description: Supporting future leaders in biomedical science and medical research. For high school students committed to advancing healthcare through science.

name: High School Chemistry Scholarship
description: Scholarship for high school students excelling in chemistry. For students planning chemistry or chemical engineering studies.

name: High School Cybersecurity Scholarship
description: For high school students interested in cybersecurity and information security. Addresses critical need for cybersecurity professionals.

name: High School Data Science Scholarship
description: Supporting high school students in data science and analytics. For future data scientists and analysts.

name: High School Aerospace Engineering Scholarship
description: For high school students interested in aerospace or aeronautical engineering. Supporting the next generation of aerospace engineers.

name: High School Artificial Intelligence Scholarship
description: For high school students specializing in artificial intelligence and machine learning. Supporting AI innovation among young students.

name: High School Software Engineering Scholarship
description: For high school students interested in software engineering and development. Supporting the next generation of software developers.

name: High School Renewable Energy Scholarship
description: Supporting high school students committed to sustainable energy solutions. For future leaders in renewable energy.

name: High School Biology Scholarship
description: Scholarship for high school students excelling in biological sciences. For students planning biology or life sciences studies.

name: High School Game Development Scholarship
description: For high school students pursuing game development, combining computer science with creative design.

name: High School Mechanical Engineering Scholarship
description: For high school students interested in mechanical engineering. Supporting students in design, manufacturing, and mechanical systems.

name: High School Electrical Engineering Scholarship
description: Merit-based scholarship for high school students interested in electrical engineering. Recognizing excellence in electrical systems and electronics.

name: High School Civil Engineering Scholarship
description: For high school students interested in civil engineering and infrastructure development. Building tomorrow's infrastructure.

name: High School Materials Science Scholarship
description: For high school students interested in materials science and engineering. Advancing materials research and innovation.

name: High School Biotechnology Scholarship
description: For high school students in biotechnology and genetic engineering. Supporting biotech innovation and research.

name: High School Geology and Earth Science Scholarship
description: Supporting high school students in geology, geophysics, and earth sciences. Understanding our planet.

name: High School Marine Biology Scholarship
description: For high school students interested in marine biology and oceanography. Exploring ocean sciences and marine life.
